titleStmt.title: A true account of the burning and sad condition of Bantam in the East-Indies in the war begun by the young king against his father, and of the great and imminent danger of the English factory there : in a letter from a member of the said factory, to a friend in London, by the last ship, which arrived on Saturday the 23th of this instant September 1682.
titleStmt.author: Member of the said factory.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
